name: Overhead
description: A bunker evacuated miles below the earth, you were kept frozen and forgotten ... until now. Overhead, a first person game of exploration, puzzles and terror. survive experiments and mutations in the dark and discover the surface exit. if it still exists.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2.3 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core i3 - 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2048 MB Storage: 5 GB available space
